Name: Serpent Sergeant Pixel
Description: Hailing from the digital depths of the WebtrES club, Serpent Sergeant Pixel is known for his distinct orange casing and the unmistakable snake-like screen that hints at his sly and strategic nature. As a member of the club's elite digital defense force, he's always at the ready with his soldier-styled buttons and limbs, enforcing the code of conduct and keeping virtual intruders at bay. Despite his stern exterior, he's a beloved character among the pixelated ranks, weaving his way through complex circuitry with the grace of a serpent and the precision of a seasoned tactician.
